The creed-forgers detected in reply to a pamphlet falsely called the Quakers-creed, containing twelve articles / published by some, who have not joyned with Geo. Keith in his pride and contradiction, but testifie against both him, and them that joyn with him therein. Field, John, 1652-1723.
16 p.
Printed and sold by T. Sowle, London : 1700.
Attributed by Wing to John Field. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======

16 p.
Printed and sold by T. Sowle, London : 1700.
Attributed by Wing to John Field. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
